text: Debate Ederson's transfer request: Is he betraying Manchester City or just looking out for himself? The future of Ederson at Manchester City remains up in the air. Despite spending over 7 years at Etihad and winning over 17 trophies for Pep Guardiola‚Äôs side, the talk surrounding the Brazilian international to leave the Premier League champions continues to intensify. While fans continue to search for the answers regarding his potential departure, an interesting revelation has come to light that has sent many in disbelief. What if we tell you that the star goalie is allegedly pondering a decision to leave just because someone else was praised for their heroics? That someone is City‚Äôs back goalkeeper Stefan Ortega. Well, as per [a bizarre disclosure from journalist Sam Lee](https://x.com/City_Xtra/status/1816413088502907263?t=fFB-11q3-zK4ZTxY4JKoLg&s=08), Ederson was reportedly not impressed by the praise Ortega received for his title-defining save last season. It came during the clash against Tottenham Hotspur while facing Son Heung-min in a 1-v-1 situation. This was just the start for the Brazilian to question his time in the Blue side of Manchester as he further got informed of a suggestion primarily from the Cityzens that Ederson himself would not have been able to save it.
